title: Roar
author: Katy Perry
lyrics:
[00:19.74] I used to bite my tongue and hold my breath
[00:22.47] Scared to rock the boat and make a mess
[00:25.37] So I sat quietly, agreed politely
[00:30.08] I guess that I forgot I had a choice
[00:33.03] I let you push me past the breaking point
[00:35.84] I stood for nothing, so I fell for everything
[00:41.12] 
[00:47.38] You held me down, but I got up (hey)
[00:50.36] Already brushing off the dust
[00:52.72] You hear my voice, you hear that sound
[00:55.77] Like thunder, gonna shake the ground
[00:57.82] You held me down, but I got up (hey)
[01:00.76] Get ready 'cause I've had enough
[01:03.30] I see it all, I see it now
[01:06.07] I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter
[01:10.63] Dancing through the fire
[01:13.26] 'Cause I am a champion, and you're gonna hear me roar
[01:19.56] Louder, louder than a lion
[01:23.71] 'Cause I am the champion, and you're gonna hear me roar
[01:30.89] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:33.03] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:35.62] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:37.97] You're gonna hear me roar
[01:43.52] Now I'm floating like a butterfly
[01:45.43] Stinging like a bee, I earned my stripes
[01:49.04] I went from zero, to my own hero
[01:53.33] You held me down, but I got up (hey)
[01:56.99] Already brushing off the dust
[01:58.99] You hear my voice, you hear that sound
[02:02.39] Like thunder, gonna shake the ground
[02:04.46] You held me down, but I got up (got up)
[02:07.76] Get ready 'cause I've had enough
[02:09.83] I see it all, I see it now
[02:12.64] I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter
[02:17.44] Dancing through the fire
[02:19.92] 'Cause I am a champion, and you're gonna hear me roar
[02:26.57] Louder, louder than a lion
[02:30.58] 'Cause I am a champion, and you're gonna hear me roar
[02:37.10] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:39.04] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:42.00] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:44.47] You're gonna hear me roar
[02:48.26] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh (yeah)
[02:50.47] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh (you'll hear me roar)
[02:53.07] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[02:55.13] You're gonna hear me roar
[02:58.72] 
[03:07.10] Roar, roar, roar, roar, roar
[03:14.63] I got the eye of the tiger, a fighter
[03:18.80] Dancing through the fire 'cause I am a champion
[03:24.32] And you're gonna hear me roar, oh, louder, louder than a lion
[03:32.23] 'Cause I am a champion, and you're gonna hear me roar
[03:38.84] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:41.14] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh (yeah)
[03:43.71] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:46.16] You're gonna hear me roar
[03:49.48] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:51.76] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh (you'll hear me roar)
[03:54.49] Oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:56.97] You're gonna hear me roar
[03:59.04]
